program main

    implicit none

    character(len=1000) :: input_str
    integer :: c =0
    integer :: top =0
    character(len=1) :: stack(1000)
    integer :: first_output
    character(len=10) :: str1, str2
    integer :: result =0
    integer :: pos =1
    character(len=10) :: token

    ! Read input
    read(*,'(a)',advance='no') input_str

    ! Process first program's logic
    do i =1, len_trim(input_str)
        character(len=1) :: char
        char = input_str(i:i)
        top = top +1
        stack(top) = char
        do while (top >=2)
            character(len=1) :: p, q
            p = stack(top)
            q = stack(top-1)
            if ( (p == '1' .and. q == '0') .or. (p == '0' .and. q == '1') ) then
                c = c +1
                top = top -2
            else
                exit
            end if
        end do
    end do

    first_output = 2 * c

    ! Convert to string
    write(str1, '(i0)') first_output
    str1 = adjustl(str1)  ! Remove leading spaces

    ! Replace commas with spaces (though none expected)
    str2 = str1
    do i =1, len_trim(str2)
        if (str2(i:i) == ',') then
            str2(i:i) = ' '
        end if
    end do

    ! Split into tokens and count
    result =0
    pos =1
    do while (pos <= len_trim(str2))
        ! Skip spaces
        do while (pos <= len_trim(str2) .and. str2(pos:pos) == ' ')
            pos = pos +1
        end do
        if (pos > len_trim(str2)) exit
        integer :: start = pos
        do while (pos <= len_trim(str2) .and. str2(pos:pos) /= ' ')
            pos = pos +1
        end do
        integer :: end_pos = pos -1
        token = str2(start:end_pos)
        result = result +1
